step_data.thought:
I see that I'm encountering an error when trying to send a message to the user. The error indicates I received an empty action, which suggests there might be an issue with the formatting of my send_msg_to_user action. Looking at my previous attempts, I need to ensure I'm providing a properly formatted action.

Based on the current page, I can see I'm already in the Catalog Price Rule section under MARKETING/Promotions. I can see two catalog price rules in the table:
1. "20% off all Women's and Men's Pants" - Active, applied to Main Website
2. "Spring sale" - Starting May 1, 2023, Active, applied to Main Website

Let me try to send a message to the user again with the correct formatting to report my findings.
step_data.action: stop('I have checked the MARKETING section for promotional activities. In the Promotions area, I found two active Catalog Price Rules: "20% off all Women\\'s and Men\\'s Pants" and "Spring sale" which starts May 1, 2023. Both rules are currently active and applied to the Main Website.')
